alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:05PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Otero, northwestern Baca, northeastern Las Animas and Bent Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 505 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Las Animas to 10 miles southwest of Higbee to 11 miles south of Thatcher. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Las Animas, McClave, Higbee, Hasty, John Martin Reservoir, Fort Lyon and Caddoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
